name: The Endless Adventure (itch)
description:
EDIT:  It was pointed out that I never mentioned Z was confirm and X was cancel.  So I'm doing that now.

My submission to the 2023 Dungeon Crawler Game Jam.
I'm happy yo have finally participated in a Jam, and I found this genre a fun one to work on.

You can Fullscreen with F4, but I forgot to add the toggle to the end screen, so it might be a little fiddly to get out.

Declarations:
I developed most the environmental generation system in prep time before the jam, though I refined it and created the end graphics during the Jam.

The Dungeon music was made specifically for the game, but the battle music, victory jingle and sound effects were pre-made.
